alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 10:31AM CST until December 25 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Total snow accumulation 5 to 8 inches and near zero visibility at times. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Towner, Benson, Ramsey and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 4 PM CST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Heavy snowfall and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts and visibilities will vary over short distances.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
